ResetConsumeOffset.title: ResetConsumeOffset
ResetConsumeOffset.summary: Resets the consumer offset of a consumer group. If you reset a consumer offset, the offset from which a consumer starts to consume messages is changed. If faults occur or wrong messages are consumed during message consumption, you can reset the consumer offset to roll back the consumption to a specific offset for reconsumption. You can also reset the consumer offset to the latest offset and temporarily leave the accumulated messages unhandled.

StartDisasterRecoveryItem.summary: Starts a topic mapping of a Global Replicator task.
